Name: Blue Shard
Text: Gain 2 mana; Synthesis: Play with Red Shard, gain 5 mana instead

Name: Red Shard
Text: Opponent loses 2 mana; Synthesis: Play with Blue Shard, opponent loses 5 mana instead

Name: Wurm's Trap
Text: Trigger: Opponent activates a synthesis effect Action: The synthesized cards' effects act as if played individually

Name: Mana rebound
Text: Trigger: Opponent plays a non-Temporal card Action: Opponent loses mana equal to the played card's tier

Name: Flames of Hatred
Text: Opponent loses 1 mana for each card in their hand

Name: Lightning's Fury
Text: Opponent loses 1 mana for everytime they've tutored this game

Name: Tornado
Text: Tornado does not trigger temporal cards. Remove a card from the field

Name: New Beginnings
Text: Opponent discards 2 cards and draws 2 cards

Name: Devil's Advocate
Text: Opponent may not tutor for the next 2 turns

Name: Wurm's Destruction
Text: Opponent reveals their hand, you may select a Temporal card for them to discard
